text: Hey guys! So our HubSpot COS website has been very slow recently. Does anyone have any tips on how I can tackle some of these issues to speed up the site?

I dont think you'll be able to do much about the GZIP stuff as that would be on the server of those services (same with the minification of JS's from things like FB and so on). The caching thing though I would assume HS might be able to address (though not sure with the usage of cloudflare). As far as minification of JS on HubSpot stuff, that should be happening.
